benchmark_details.name: Spartun3D (Situated Spatial Understanding of 3D World in Large Language Models)
benchmark_details.overview: Spartun3D introduces a scalable situated 3D dataset that incorporates various situated spatial reasoning tasks, aiming to enhance the alignment between 3D visual representations and their corresponding textual descriptions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance the situated understanding of 3D-based large language models through a new dataset and model architecture.

data.source: Generated dataset based on 3D scenes from 3RScan.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated as per standard NLP evaluation methods.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in generating situated responses.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments on various tasks demonstrating effectiveness.
